text: We must put families first. Today during the @user oversight hearing I pressed the FDA on their failure to act urgently & provide basic transparency surrounding the production of baby formula before it became a crisis.Watch:https://t.co/6yyX7z9HMU

American families are struggling. Along with the 40-year record high inflation spiking food prices and record high gas prices parents are now faced with a new crisis: a shortage of baby formula.https://t.co/6oNOO63qpV
